column4: Well xangua, that wasn't the best possible response -- If you know where he should go, direct him!

I am using 12.04 LTS on a Dell Latitude N7110 (17R). No sound it coming out from the headphone jack, even though the Intel onboard audio is a Ubuntu-certified component available within many machines. Help would be appreciated.
you may find you have better luck in the #alsa channel as they are much more familiar with sound issues and there doesn't appear to be anyone here right now that is
